member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to upload configurations.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to apply a configuration template to all metrics or a given metric under an account or a namespace.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [modify configuration files].

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [replace authorized certs].

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to add/remove an authorized cert to an account.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [run with parameter file].

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [increment version by 1] for local configuration files.

member.summary: Gets the account name to replace with for local configuration files.

member.summary: Gets the metric namespace to replace with for local configuration files.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is monitors config.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is topology config.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is resource types config.

member.summary: Gets the monitoring account.

member.summary: Gets the cert thumbprint for the certificate used to talk to MDM endpoint.

member.summary: Gets the cert thumbprint for the certificate to add to an account.

member.summary: Gets the cert thumbprint for the certificate to remove from an account.

member.name: P:MdmConfigUtility.CommandLineArguments.CertStore
member.summary: Gets the cert store for the certificate used to talk to MDM endpoint.

member.name: P:MdmConfigUtility.CommandLineArguments.Force
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to forcefully apply the configuration, overwriting the existing configuration if exists.

member.name: P:MdmConfigUtility.CommandLineArguments.AllowMinMaxSamplingTypeInTemplate
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to allow min/max sampling types in templates.
member.remarks: We don't want to allow min/max in templates by default - customers have to ask and we then tell them to use this flag.

member.name: P:MdmConfigUtility.CommandLineArguments.DownloadEmptyMetricConfig
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to download empty metric configurations which are generated on the fly by the metrics server.

member.name: P:MdmConfigUtility.CommandLineArguments.WhatIf
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to show the projected changes without making the changes.

member.summary: Get the role name for the cert to be added or updated.

member.summary: Gets the maximum size of the file name that will be created locally when downloading configurations.

member.name: T:MdmConfigUtility.Helpers.VersionComparer
member.summary: The comparer class for configuration versions.

member.name: M:MdmConfigUtility.Helpers.VersionComparer.CompareVersionWithServer(MdmConfigUtility.CommandLineArguments,Microsoft.Online.Metrics.Common.EventConfiguration.EventConfiguration,Microsoft.Online.Metrics.Common.EventConfiguration.EventConfiguration)
member.summary: Compares the configuration versions from the file with those on the server.
member.returns: 1 if configuration from file has a higher version number, -1 if lower, and 0 if identical.

members.member:
Compares the metrics version with server.
The metric configuration from file. The event configuration on server. 1 if configuration from file has a higher version number, -1 if lower, and 0 if identical.

member.name: M:MdmConfigUtility.Helpers.VersionComparer.CompareMonitorsVersionWithServer(Microsoft.Online.Metrics.Common.EventConfiguration.EventConfiguration,Microsoft.Online.Metrics.Common.EventConfiguration.EventConfiguration)
member.summary: Compares the monitors versions with those from server.
member.returns: 1 if at least one monitor configurations from file have a higher version number and no monitor has a lower version number, -1 if any monitor from file has a lower version number, and 0 if all monitors have identical version numbers as those on server.

members.member:
Compares the version with server.
The configuration from file. The configuration on server. 1 if configuration from file has a higher version number, -1 if lower, and 0 if identical.

Compares the version with server.
The configuration from file. The configuration on server. 1 if configuration from file has a higher version number, -1 if lower, and 0 if identical.
